function NPC_605001:Init(NPCID) --[[ 1: OTL 누적데미지 2: OTL Count --]]
NPC_ReserveUserData(NPCID, 2)
NPC_605001.LimitForOTL = NPC_605001.MaxHP/20 NPC_101000.LimitForPain = 1000
NPC_605001.TalIdIdot = 260500102 NPC_605001.TalIdOTL = 260500130 NPC_605001.TalIdEnrage = 260500107 NPC_605001.TalIdPain = 260500109
NPC_605001.TalIdWhirlWind = 260500123 NPC_605001.TalIdWhirlWindFast = 260500124
NPC_605001.TalIdHeapAttack = 260500125 NPC_605001.TalIdFlopDown = 260500126 NPC_605001.TalIdShoulderAttack = 260500141 NPC_605001.TalIdThrowStone = 260500144 end
-- 뒤에있으면 무조건 드러 눞는다. (뒤로가지마라) -- 앞에있으면 엉덩이 프레스
function NPC_605001:PressAttack( ThisNPC, Enemy ) local Dist = ThisNPC:DistanceTo( Enemy ) if Dist > 300 then return end
if Enemy:IsRear( ThisNPC ) then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf(NPC_605001.TalIdFlopDown) else ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf(NPC_605001.TalIdHeapAttack) end end
function NPC_605001:OnBPartRecover() for i=1, 2 do this:SetUserData( i, 0) end -- for end
function NPC_605001:OnFinishDashAttack( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) ThisNPC:Aggro( "short", 0 )
-- 반피이하일때는 바보짓 안함 if ThisNPC:GetHP()/ThisNPC:GetMaxHP() > 0.5 and math.random( 0, 1 ) == 0 then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_605001.TalIdIdot ) end end
function NPC_605001:OnFinishAndAggro( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) ThisNPC:Aggro( "short", 0 ) end
function NPC_605001:Stressed( ThisNPC, Enemy ) local Distance = ThisNPC:DistanceTo( Enemy ) local r = math.random(0, 3)
if Distance < 500 then -- 근거리 if r == 0 then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_605001.TalIdWhirlWindFast ) elseif r == 1 then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_605001.TalIdHeapAttack ) else ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_605001.TalIdFlopDown ) end else if r == 0 then ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_605001.TalIdShoulderAttack, Enemy ) else ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_605001.TalIdThrowStone, Enemy ) end end end
function NPC_605001:AccDamage( ThisNPC, HitInfo ) ProcessPain( ThisNPC, HitInfo, NPC_605001.TalIdPain, 1 ) return HitInfo end
function NPC_605001:OTL(HitInfo) return HitInfo --[[ local ThisNPC = AsNPC( HitInfo.Victim ) if ThisNPC:GetMode() == 0 then return HitInfo end
local totalDamage = ThisNPC:GetUserData(1) + HitInfo.Damage local totalCount = ThisNPC:GetUserData(2)
ThisNPC:SetUserData(1, totalDamage)
if totalDamage > NPC_605001.LimitForOTL then if totalCount < 4 then ThisNPC:SetUserData(1, 0) ThisNPC:SetUserData(2, totalCount + 1)
if not ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_605001.TalIdEnrage ) then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_605001.TalIdEnrage ) end
return HitInfo else if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_605001.TalIdPain ) or ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_605001.TalIdOTL ) then return HitInfo end
ThisNPC:SetUserData(1, 0) ThisNPC:SetUserData(2, totalCount + 1)
ThisNPC:ClearJob()
if totalCount % 2 == 1 then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_605001.TalIdPain ) else ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_605001.TalIdOTL ) end
return HitInfo end end
return HitInfo --]] end
function NPC_605001:OnHitCapsule_0_0(HitInfo) return NPC_605001:AccDamage(this, HitInfo) end
function NPC_605001:OnHitCapsule_1_0(HitInfo) return NPC_605001:OTL(HitInfo) end
function NPC_605001:OnHitCapsule_1_1(HitInfo) return NPC_605001:OTL(HitInfo) end
function NPC_605001:OnHitCapsule_2_0(HitInfo)
end
function NPC_605001:OnHitCapsule_2_1(HitInfo) -- 머리 뽀개기 local victim = AsNPC( HitInfo.Victim ) local attacker = HitInfo.Attacker
if victim:CheckBPart(1) then return HitInfo end
-- if victim:GetHP()/victim:GetMaxHP() < 0.3 then -- victim:BreakPart(1, attacker) -- end
return HitInfo end
function NPC_605001:OnHitCapsule_2_2(HitInfo) return HitInfo end
function NPC_605001:OnHitCapsule_3_0(HitInfo) return HitInfo end
function NPC_605001:OnHitCapsule_3_1(HitInfo) return HitInfo end
function NPC_605001:OnHitCapsule_3_2(HitInfo) return HitInfo end
function NPC_605001:OnHitCapsule_3_3(HitInfo) return HitInfo end
